project.name: Tryambakam Noesis - Wave 3: Advanced Features & Ecosystem
assumptions: ML/AI models can be hosted externally
risks: User data privacy requires careful handling

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 1: User Management & Personalization
phases.objective: Implement comprehensive user profiles, history tracking, and personalized experiences

tasks.title: Design user profile data model
tasks.deliverable: PostgreSQL schema for user profiles with birth data, preferences, settings
tasks.acceptance: Schema supports timezone, location, privacy settings, notification preferences

tasks.title: Implement user registration endpoint
tasks.acceptance: Creates user record, returns JWT, validates email format

tasks.title: Implement user login with JWT refresh
tasks.deliverable: Login with access token + refresh token pattern
tasks.acceptance: Short-lived access tokens, long-lived refresh tokens, rotation on use

tasks.title: Implement password reset flow
tasks.deliverable: Secure password reset via email token
tasks.acceptance: Time-limited reset tokens, secure token generation, email integration

tasks.title: Create user profile GET endpoint
tasks.acceptance: Returns birth data, preferences, consciousness level, created_at

tasks.title: Create user profile UPDATE endpoint
tasks.acceptance: Partial updates, validation, audit logging of changes

tasks.title: Implement birth data validation
tasks.deliverable: Comprehensive birth data validation (date range, coordinates, timezone)
tasks.acceptance: Rejects impossible dates, validates lat/lng ranges, verifies timezone

tasks.title: Implement OAuth2 integration (Google)
tasks.acceptance: Users can sign up/login with Google, profile data synced

tasks.title: Implement OAuth2 integration (Apple)
tasks.acceptance: Apple OAuth flow, hide email support, iOS compatibility

tasks.title: Create consciousness level progression system
tasks.deliverable: Track user engagement, calculate consciousness level 0-5
tasks.acceptance: Levels based on usage patterns, reflection completions, time spent

tasks.title: Write user management tests
tasks.deliverable: Unit and integration tests for all user endpoints
tasks.acceptance: 90%+ coverage, edge cases tested, auth flows verified

tasks.title: Document user management API
tasks.deliverable: API docs for auth and user endpoints
tasks.acceptance: Curl examples, response schemas, error codes documented

tasks.title: Design calculation history schema
tasks.deliverable: PostgreSQL schema for storing user calculation history
tasks.acceptance: Links to user_id, stores engine_id, input, output summary, timestamp

tasks.title: Implement automatic history tracking
tasks.deliverable: Middleware to log all engine calculations to history
tasks.acceptance: Every calculation saved, async logging, no performance impact

tasks.title: Create history listing endpoint
tasks.acceptance: Paginated results, filter by engine, sort by date, search capability

tasks.title: Implement history detail retrieval
tasks.acceptance: Returns complete calculation output, ownership verified

tasks.title: Implement history deletion
tasks.acceptance: Soft delete with recovery period, hard delete after 30 days

tasks.title: Design favorites/bookmarks system
tasks.deliverable: Schema for user favorites with categories and notes
tasks.acceptance: Users can save calculations, add notes, organize by category

tasks.title: Implement add to favorites
tasks.deliverable: POST endpoint to save calculation to favorites
tasks.acceptance: Creates favorite from history or directly, with custom notes

tasks.title: Implement favorites management
tasks.deliverable: CRUD endpoints for favorites with categories
tasks.acceptance: List, update notes, change category, remove favorites

tasks.title: Create insights from history
tasks.deliverable: Generate usage insights and patterns from user history
tasks.acceptance: Most used engines, calculation frequency, preferred times

tasks.title: Implement data export (GDPR)
tasks.deliverable: Export all user data as JSON download
tasks.acceptance: Complete data export including history, favorites, profile

tasks.title: Write history and favorites tests
tasks.deliverable: Test suite for history and favorites functionality
tasks.acceptance: All CRUD operations tested, pagination verified, privacy ensured

tasks.title: Document history and favorites API
tasks.deliverable: API documentation for history and favorites endpoints
tasks.acceptance: Examples for all endpoints, pagination explained

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 2: Real-time Features & Collaboration
phases.objective: Implement WebSocket support, live updates, and collaborative features

tasks.title: Design WebSocket architecture
tasks.deliverable: WebSocket connection handling, message protocol, room management
tasks.acceptance: Scalable to 10K concurrent connections, message types defined

tasks.title: Implement WebSocket connection handling
tasks.deliverable: Axum WebSocket upgrade handler with auth
tasks.acceptance: JWT validation on connection, connection pooling, heartbeat

tasks.title: Implement real-time engine updates
tasks.deliverable: Push engine calculation updates to connected clients
tasks.acceptance: Calculation start/progress/complete events sent via WebSocket

tasks.title: Implement live Vedic clock updates
tasks.deliverable: Real-time TCM organ clock and dosha transitions
tasks.acceptance: Updates every minute on organ transitions, dosha changes

tasks.title: Implement notification system
tasks.acceptance: In-app notifications, email notifications, preference management

tasks.title: Create daily guidance notification
tasks.deliverable: Scheduled daily insights based on user preferences
tasks.acceptance: Cron job sends daily guidance at user-preferred time

tasks.title: Create transit alert notifications
tasks.deliverable: Alert users of significant astrological transits
tasks.acceptance: Detects major transits, sends advance notifications

tasks.title: Implement Redis Streams for events
tasks.deliverable: Event streaming infrastructure with Redis Streams
tasks.acceptance: Pub/sub for real-time events, persistence, consumer groups

tasks.title: Write WebSocket integration tests
tasks.acceptance: Connection, auth, message flow, reconnection tested

tasks.title: Document WebSocket protocol
tasks.deliverable: WebSocket API documentation with message formats
tasks.acceptance: All message types documented with examples

tasks.title: Design sharing system
tasks.deliverable: Schema for shareable links with access controls
tasks.acceptance: Public, private, password-protected share options

tasks.title: Implement calculation sharing
tasks.acceptance: Unique tokens, expiration dates, view tracking

tasks.title: Implement shared calculation viewer
tasks.deliverable: Public endpoint to view shared calculations
tasks.acceptance: Clean view of calculation without auth, privacy controls respected

tasks.title: Create comparison feature schema
tasks.deliverable: Data model for storing compatibility comparisons
tasks.acceptance: Supports 2+ people, multiple comparison types

tasks.title: Implement Human Design compatibility
tasks.deliverable: HD chart comparison with composite analysis
tasks.acceptance: Electromagnetic, compromise, dominance, companion analysis

tasks.title: Implement astrological synastry
tasks.acceptance: Kuta matching, Ashtakoot analysis, planetary friendships

tasks.title: Create relationship workflow
tasks.acceptance: Combines HD, astrology, numerology for relationship insights

tasks.title: Implement group calculations
tasks.acceptance: Family charts, team dynamics, group compatibility

tasks.title: Write collaboration tests
tasks.deliverable: Tests for sharing and comparison features
tasks.acceptance: Privacy, access control, comparison accuracy verified

tasks.title: Document collaboration API
tasks.deliverable: API docs for sharing and comparison endpoints
tasks.acceptance: Examples for all sharing and comparison features

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 3: Analytics & Machine Learning
phases.objective: Implement usage analytics, pattern recognition, and AI-powered insights

tasks.title: Design analytics data warehouse
tasks.deliverable: Schema for analytics data with event tracking
tasks.acceptance: Supports user behavior, engine usage, performance metrics

tasks.title: Implement event tracking system
tasks.acceptance: Tracks page views, engine usage, workflow execution, zero impact

tasks.title: Create analytics aggregation pipeline
tasks.acceptance: Aggregated tables for fast querying, scheduled jobs

tasks.title: Build admin analytics dashboard API
tasks.deliverable: API endpoints for admin dashboard metrics
tasks.acceptance: User growth, engine popularity, performance metrics endpoints

tasks.title: Implement user-facing insights API
tasks.deliverable: Personal analytics for users about their usage
tasks.acceptance: Most used engines, calculation patterns, time trends

tasks.title: Create anomaly detection for engine performance
tasks.deliverable: Detect unusual patterns in engine performance
tasks.acceptance: Alerts on latency spikes, error rate increases

tasks.title: Implement cohort analysis
tasks.deliverable: User cohort tracking and retention metrics
tasks.acceptance: Cohort tables, retention curves, engagement tracking

tasks.title: Write analytics tests
tasks.acceptance: Event tracking, aggregation, API endpoints tested

tasks.title: Document analytics system
tasks.deliverable: Documentation for analytics schema and API
tasks.acceptance: Schema diagrams, API examples, event types documented

tasks.title: Design recommendation engine architecture
tasks.acceptance: Feature store, model serving, A/B testing framework

tasks.title: Implement engine recommendation based on history
tasks.deliverable: Recommend engines based on user patterns
tasks.acceptance: Collaborative filtering, content-based recommendations

tasks.title: Implement workflow recommendation
tasks.deliverable: Suggest workflows based on user context
tasks.acceptance: Time-based, history-based, goal-based suggestions

tasks.title: Create pattern recognition for themes
tasks.deliverable: NLP model to extract and cluster themes from results
tasks.acceptance: Theme clustering, similarity scoring, trend detection

tasks.title: Implement LLM integration for insights
tasks.acceptance: Optional AI-enhanced witness prompts, configurable

tasks.title: Create personalized daily guidance ML model
tasks.deliverable: Model for personalized daily guidance generation
tasks.acceptance: Trained on user feedback, improves over time

tasks.title: Implement feedback collection system
tasks.deliverable: Collect user feedback on calculations and insights
tasks.acceptance: Rating system, text feedback, feedback storage

tasks.title: Create A/B testing framework
tasks.deliverable: Feature flag and A/B testing system
tasks.acceptance: Split traffic, measure outcomes, statistical significance

tasks.title: Write ML feature tests
tasks.acceptance: Recommendation quality, feedback flow, A/B tests verified

tasks.title: Document ML features
tasks.deliverable: Documentation for ML features and recommendations
tasks.acceptance: How recommendations work, privacy considerations, opt-out

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 4: Mobile SDKs & Client Libraries
phases.objective: Build official SDKs for iOS, Android, and web clients

tasks.title: Design iOS SDK architecture
tasks.deliverable: Swift SDK structure with async/await support
tasks.acceptance: Clean API design, Combine support, Swift 5.9+

tasks.title: Implement iOS SDK authentication
tasks.acceptance: Secure token storage, automatic refresh, biometric auth

tasks.title: Implement iOS SDK engine client
tasks.acceptance: All engines accessible, type-safe responses, error handling

tasks.title: Implement iOS SDK caching
tasks.deliverable: Local cache for calculations and user data
tasks.acceptance: Core Data/SQLite cache, TTL support, offline mode

tasks.title: Implement iOS WebSocket client
tasks.acceptance: Connection management, reconnection, message handling

tasks.title: Create iOS SDK example app
tasks.deliverable: Sample iOS app demonstrating SDK features
tasks.acceptance: All major features demonstrated, SwiftUI interface

tasks.title: Write iOS SDK documentation
tasks.deliverable: iOS SDK README, API docs, integration guide
tasks.acceptance: CocoaPods/SPM installation, usage examples, API reference

tasks.title: Package iOS SDK for distribution
tasks.deliverable: CocoaPods podspec and Swift Package Manager support
tasks.acceptance: Published to CocoaPods trunk, SPM compatible

tasks.title: Design Android SDK architecture
tasks.deliverable: Kotlin SDK with coroutines and Flow
tasks.acceptance: Clean API, Kotlin 1.9+, coroutines support

tasks.title: Implement Android SDK authentication
tasks.acceptance: EncryptedSharedPreferences, auto refresh, biometric

tasks.title: Implement Android SDK engine client
tasks.acceptance: All engines accessible, data classes, error handling

tasks.title: Implement Android SDK caching
tasks.deliverable: Room database cache for offline support
tasks.acceptance: Local persistence, TTL, offline mode

tasks.title: Create Android SDK example app
tasks.deliverable: Sample Android app with Compose UI
tasks.acceptance: Jetpack Compose, all features demonstrated

tasks.title: Create JavaScript/TypeScript client library
tasks.acceptance: TypeScript types, axios client, React hooks

tasks.title: Write Android SDK documentation
tasks.deliverable: Android SDK docs and integration guide
tasks.acceptance: Maven Central setup, usage examples, API reference

tasks.title: Write JavaScript client documentation
tasks.acceptance: Installation, React integration, API reference

tasks.title: Package Android SDK for Maven Central
tasks.acceptance: Gradle dependency available, signed artifacts

tasks.title: Publish JavaScript client to npm
tasks.acceptance: npm install @tryambakam/noesis-client works

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 5: Advanced Security & Compliance
phases.objective: Implement enterprise-grade security, audit logging, and compliance features

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive audit logging
tasks.deliverable: Audit trail for all sensitive operations
tasks.acceptance: User actions, admin actions, data access logged immutably

tasks.title: Implement data encryption at rest
tasks.acceptance: Birth data encrypted, key rotation support

tasks.title: Implement API key versioning and rotation
tasks.acceptance: Versioned keys, graceful rotation, revocation

tasks.title: Create admin panel API
tasks.deliverable: Admin endpoints for user management, system monitoring
tasks.acceptance: Role-based admin access, audit review, user management

tasks.title: Implement rate limit per-engine
tasks.deliverable: Different rate limits for different engines
tasks.acceptance: Heavy engines (HD) lower limit, light engines higher

tasks.title: Implement request signing for webhooks
tasks.acceptance: Signed payloads, signature verification, replay protection

tasks.title: Create security scanning automation
tasks.deliverable: CI security scanning with cargo-audit, dependency check
tasks.acceptance: Automated vulnerability scanning on every build

tasks.title: Implement DDoS protection
tasks.deliverable: Rate limiting at edge, IP blocking
tasks.acceptance: CloudFlare/AWS Shield integration, automatic mitigation

tasks.title: Write security documentation
tasks.deliverable: Security guide for developers and users
tasks.acceptance: Data handling, encryption, compliance info

tasks.title: Conduct penetration testing
tasks.acceptance: Professional pentest, critical issues remediated

tasks.title: Implement GDPR right to erasure
tasks.deliverable: Complete account deletion with data purging
tasks.acceptance: All user data deleted, backups purged after retention

tasks.title: Implement GDPR data portability
tasks.acceptance: Structured export suitable for import elsewhere

tasks.title: Create privacy policy enforcement
tasks.acceptance: Granular consent, opt-out respected, consent history

tasks.title: Implement data retention policies
tasks.acceptance: Configurable retention, automatic cleanup, audit logs

tasks.title: Create compliance reporting
tasks.acceptance: GDPR metrics, data subject request tracking

tasks.title: Implement cookie consent management
tasks.deliverable: Cookie consent banner and preference center
tasks.acceptance: GDPR compliant, granular controls, remembers choice

tasks.title: Write compliance documentation
tasks.deliverable: GDPR compliance guide, DPA, security overview
tasks.acceptance: Legal review passed, published on website

tasks.title: Create incident response plan
tasks.acceptance: Breach notification, escalation, recovery procedures

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 6: New Engine Types & Advanced Features
phases.objective: Add new consciousness engines and advanced calculation features

tasks.title: Implement Planetary Hours engine
tasks.acceptance: Day/night hour calculation, planetary rulership, optimal timing

tasks.title: Implement Electional Astrology engine
tasks.acceptance: Tithi/constellation analysis for specific activities

tasks.title: Implement Transit tracking engine
tasks.acceptance: Current transits, upcoming, aspect detection

tasks.title: Implement Progressions engine
tasks.acceptance: Day for a year progressions, progressed chart

tasks.title: Implement Solar Return engine
tasks.acceptance: Yearly predictions based on solar return chart

tasks.title: Create new engines integration tests
tasks.deliverable: Tests for all new astrological engines
tasks.acceptance: Accuracy validation against reference data

tasks.title: Document new engines
tasks.deliverable: Context docs for planetary hours, electional, transits
tasks.acceptance: Calculation methods, use cases, examples

tasks.title: Implement HD Transit tracking
tasks.deliverable: Human Design daily transits and conditioning
tasks.acceptance: Sun/Earth transits, gate activations, conditioning themes

tasks.title: Implement HD Cycle tracking
tasks.deliverable: Saturn return, Uranus opposition, Kiron return
tasks.acceptance: Life cycle tracking with timing and themes

tasks.title: Implement Gene Keys Hologenetic Profile
tasks.acceptance: 12 sphere calculations, Venus sequence

tasks.title: Implement Asteroid astrology engine
tasks.deliverable: Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta, Chiron calculations
tasks.acceptance: Asteroid positions, aspects, meanings

tasks.title: Implement Fixed Stars engine
tasks.acceptance: Aldebaran, Regulus, Spica, etc. parans and alignments

tasks.title: Create esoteric engines tests
tasks.deliverable: Tests for HD cycles and esoteric features
tasks.acceptance: Transit accuracy, cycle timing verified

tasks.title: Document esoteric engines
tasks.deliverable: Context docs for HD transits, cycles, asteroids
tasks.acceptance: Advanced features explained with examples

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 7: Integration Ecosystem
phases.objective: Build third-party integrations and developer platform

tasks.title: Implement Google Calendar integration
tasks.deliverable: Sync optimal timings to Google Calendar
tasks.acceptance: OAuth, event creation, transit-based reminders

tasks.title: Implement Apple Calendar integration
tasks.acceptance: iCloud calendar integration, event sync

tasks.title: Implement Zapier integration
tasks.acceptance: Triggers and actions, published Zapier app

tasks.title: Implement webhook system
tasks.acceptance: Event subscriptions, delivery retry, signing

tasks.title: Implement Slack integration
tasks.acceptance: /command support, scheduled messages, team features

tasks.title: Implement wearable device integration
tasks.acceptance: Activity data correlation with biorhythms, sleep analysis

tasks.title: Write integration documentation
tasks.acceptance: Setup instructions, OAuth flows, examples

tasks.title: Create developer portal
tasks.deliverable: Web portal for API key management, docs
tasks.acceptance: Registration, key management, usage dashboard

tasks.title: Implement sandbox environment
tasks.acceptance: Separate data, rate limits, test data

tasks.title: Create API playground
tasks.acceptance: Try-it-now feature, request/response visible

tasks.title: Implement usage quotas and billing
tasks.acceptance: Free/pro/enterprise tiers, Stripe integration

tasks.title: Create partner program API
tasks.acceptance: Custom branding, delegated auth, analytics

tasks.title: Write developer documentation
tasks.deliverable: Complete developer guide and API reference
tasks.acceptance: Getting started, authentication, all endpoints

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 8: Performance & Scale
phases.objective: Optimize performance for 100K+ users and global deployment

tasks.title: Implement query optimization
tasks.acceptance: Slow query elimination, index optimization

tasks.title: Implement connection pooling
tasks.deliverable: Optimized Postgres and Redis connection pools
tasks.acceptance: Pool sizing, connection reuse, health checks

tasks.title: Implement request batching
tasks.acceptance: Batch multiple calculations in single request

tasks.title: Implement CDN for static assets
tasks.acceptance: Global edge caching, SSL, compression

tasks.title: Implement database read replicas
tasks.acceptance: Read queries routed to replicas, lag monitoring

tasks.title: Implement caching layer optimization
tasks.acceptance: 95%+ hit rate on hot data, eviction policies

tasks.title: Implement async calculation queue
tasks.acceptance: Background processing, job status tracking

tasks.title: Create performance benchmarks
tasks.acceptance: Baseline metrics, regression detection

tasks.title: Write performance optimization guide
tasks.acceptance: Best practices, monitoring, troubleshooting

tasks.title: Implement multi-region deployment
tasks.deliverable: Deploy to multiple regions (US, EU, Asia)
tasks.acceptance: Geo-routing, data residency compliance

tasks.title: Implement disaster recovery
tasks.acceptance: RPO < 1 hour, RTO < 4 hours, tested monthly

tasks.title: Implement circuit breakers
tasks.deliverable: Circuit breaker pattern for external services
tasks.acceptance: Fail-fast, graceful degradation, auto-recovery

tasks.title: Implement chaos engineering
tasks.acceptance: Regular failure injection, recovery validation

tasks.title: Implement advanced monitoring
tasks.acceptance: 99.9% availability SLO, burn rate alerts

tasks.title: Create capacity planning automation
tasks.acceptance: Predictive scaling, cost optimization

tasks.title: Write runbooks for all services
tasks.acceptance: Every service has runbook, common issues covered

tasks.title: Conduct load test to 100K users
tasks.deliverable: Load test validation at 100K concurrent users
tasks.acceptance: System stable, latency < 500ms p95

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 9: Documentation & Community
phases.objective: Complete documentation and build developer community

tasks.title: Create comprehensive API reference
tasks.acceptance: All endpoints, schemas, examples documented

tasks.title: Write integration guides
tasks.acceptance: Web, mobile, webhook integration guides

tasks.title: Create video tutorials
tasks.acceptance: Getting started, authentication, common patterns

tasks.title: Write architecture decision records
tasks.acceptance: ADRs for key design choices, rationale

tasks.title: Create troubleshooting guide
tasks.acceptance: Common errors, solutions, debugging steps

tasks.title: Write contribution guidelines
tasks.acceptance: PR process, code standards, local setup

tasks.title: Create changelog process
tasks.acceptance: Keep a Changelog format, automated releases

tasks.title: Create example applications
tasks.acceptance: Open source, well-documented, demonstrate features

tasks.title: Set up community Discord/Forum
tasks.acceptance: Channels, moderation, welcome bot

tasks.title: Create plugin system
tasks.deliverable: Extensible plugin architecture for custom engines
tasks.acceptance: Plugin API, lifecycle management, examples

tasks.title: Launch partner program
tasks.acceptance: Application process, tiers, support

tasks.title: Create certification program
tasks.acceptance: Exam, certification, badge program

tasks.title: Plan and execute launch event
tasks.deliverable: Public launch event for Wave 3 features
tasks.acceptance: Webinar, demo, Q&A, press release

phases.name: Wave 3 Phase 10: Final Integration & Launch
phases.objective: Final testing, integration, and production launch of Wave 3

tasks.title: Execute full integration test suite
tasks.deliverable: End-to-end test of all Wave 3 features
tasks.acceptance: All critical paths tested, 95%+ pass rate

tasks.title: Perform security audit
tasks.acceptance: No critical vulnerabilities, medium issues tracked

tasks.title: Conduct accessibility audit
tasks.acceptance: Automated + manual testing, issues remediated

tasks.title: Perform data migration testing
tasks.acceptance: Zero data loss, integrity verified

tasks.title: Execute performance validation
tasks.deliverable: Load and stress testing final validation
tasks.acceptance: SLAs met under expected load

tasks.title: Create rollback procedures
tasks.deliverable: Documented rollback plan for all services
tasks.acceptance: Tested rollback, < 30 min recovery

tasks.title: Execute phased rollout
tasks.acceptance: 1%  10%  50%  100% rollout with monitoring

tasks.title: Monitor production metrics
tasks.acceptance: Dashboards, alerts, on-call rotation

tasks.title: Collect and analyze user feedback
tasks.acceptance: NPS survey, feedback categorization, action items

tasks.title: Create post-launch hotfix process
tasks.acceptance: Emergency deployment, < 1 hour to production

tasks.title: Write Wave 3 retrospective
tasks.acceptance: Wins, lessons learned, improvement actions

tasks.title: Update all documentation for launch
tasks.acceptance: All docs current, changelog updated

tasks.title: Celebrate team and communicate success
tasks.acceptance: Internal celebration, blog post, social media
